title: Gathered Truths: Thoughtful Contemplation and Sacred Inquiry
description: Sometimes, we need to take time and draw our focus inward. These moments of stillness and introspection allow for growth and intentional change.Our truths, our stories connect us to ourselves and others. They evoke emotion in us: joy, sorrow, fear and happiness. Our personal journeys create impact, change and intention and help ground us and others. This book is a collection of thoughts and inquiry that, I hope, provide opportunity for your own hope, growth, curiosity and intentional living. Close your eyes and take a deep breath in and out. Randomly choose a page or let it choose you.
author: Jennifer Yockey
